articles.title: Drugs show positive results in fight against Alzheimer's - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: After years of work, there is progress in the fight against Alzheimer’s disease, the incurable brain condition that affects more than six million Americans. Several new drugs have shown small but positive results in reducing the cognitive decline associated w…
articles.content:
William Brangham:
Earlier this month, an FDA advisory panel unanimously agreed that the drug known as Leqembi modestly slowed the progression of Alzheimer's. The FDA is expected to give final approv… [+1488 chars]
